Sentencas: A novel ionic-conductive skeletal structure was developed for an electrode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The skeletal structure was formed as an ionic-conductive frame that accumulated two thick porous layers and one dense thin layer.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Two types of green sheets were used to form the frame.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Thin green sheets (thickness: 15-30 mu m) for the dense layers were fabricated with a well-dispersed Gd0.2Ce0.8Ox (GDC) slurry and thick sheets (thickness: 150-300 mu m) were fabricated with a GDC/pore-former slurry by the tape casting method.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Sintering laminated sheets at 1450 degrees C for 8 h in air resulted in an ionic-conductive frame that was suitable for electrode-supported SOFC.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The relative density of the inner thin layer, which works as an electrolyte, was higher than 98%, and the outer thick layers remained porous after the sintering.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The porous structure of the outer layers was controlled using agglomerated slurries instead of well-dispersed slurries.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical measurements of the ionic-conductive frame attached with platinum electrodes exhibited potential as high-performance cells.
Titulo: Development of an Ionic-Conductive Skeletal Structure for an Electrode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
